pullRequest.title: Added ExprLastAttacker and ExprLastDamage
pullRequest.bodyText:
These can be used to get the last entity/block who damaged an entity and by how much they did
Target Minecraft Versions: any 
Requirements: none 
Related Issues: none

commit.message: Added ExprLastAttacker and ExprLastDamage (which can be used to get the last entity/block who damaged them and by how much they did)

nodes.bodyText: I know we ask for an extra line at the end, but I think you went a bit far here ;)
Needs a line at the end, you can grab one of the extra ones from the other expression ;)

commit.message: Distributed the new lines at the end of one file across two files and fixed a REMOVE issue

nodes.bodyText: Are you able to remove the inline annotation? I think I remember someone saying to just keep annotations to the method declaration. 🙂
can you put curly brackets around this check?
You should add a default case that asserts false.

commit.message: Updated the description and replaced Double with Long

nodes.bodyText:
There seems to be a bit of redundancy in calling entity.getLastDamageCause(), perhaps you could cache it instead?
Also, calling entity.getLastDamageCause() as event, and (EntityDamageByEntityEvent) event as evt are kinda too similar, could you rename them to something that distinguishes them better?

commit.message: Refactored some names and cached entity.getLastDamageCause()

nodes.bodyText: instead of having this mod variable can you either duplicate the code or use something like delta[0] = (Long) delta[0] * -1
same thing here, can you just use ExprDamage and pass in the last event? skript actually has some modifiers on how the damage is returned (like dividing by 2 for EntityDamageEvent)
could you put a private modifier on this guy?
could you put a private modifier on this guy?
could you remove the this. here? your other file doesn't have it and i checked a couple expressions and it looks like most of them don't either

commit.message: Updated everything according to what Pikachu said.
Removed some imports and added an empty line
